code: /* eslint-disable no-useless-rename */import React,{useContext}from'react';import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{BookContext}from'../context/books';var Books=function Books(){var _useContext=useContext(BookContext),books=_useContext.books;if(!books.length){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h3",null,"No Books Available");}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("section",{className:"books"},books.map(function(_ref){var image=_ref.image,id=_ref.id,title=_ref.title;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("article",{key:id,className:"book"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"book-image"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("img",{src:image,alt:title})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"books/".concat(id),className:"btn book-link"},"details"));}));};export default Books;
